name: [Alfa] Saga Savior - Easter
description:
Status - Alfa v1.0

This game is in Alfa state! Stay tuned for uptades.

Please leave your feedback in the comments. 

GAME PLAY

A Match 3, saga game, in Easter theme, telling the history of Jesus’s Easter, from the departure of Bethany towards Jerusalem, passing through the crucifixion and ending at the resurrection.

There are current 15 levels to complete the game in 3 chapters:

Chapter 1: Rote from Bethany to Jerusalem

Chapter 2: Olive Grove

Chapter 3: Temple of Jerusalem

Every level has diferents goals and diferent number of movements or time limits.

HOW TO PLAY

Commom match 3 rules.

Controls - Mouse and scroll to navigate,  left click to action.

[Alfa v1.0] No life sistem implemented yet, wich means you can lose any level indefinetly without losing your progress.
